Authors: Juwono E., Prabowo H., Budihastuti D., Gaol F.L.
Title: Aligning it with business model to perform organizational capabilities in achieving business performance
Authors with affiliations: Juwono, E., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Prabowo, H., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Budihastuti, D., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Gaol, F.L., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Information Technology (IT) is becoming an important driver for organization to perfom an organizational capability. Even IT is an importan driver, it is not the only one. IT should be aligned with business model to perform a organizational capabilities in achieving business performance.
Author Keywords: Business model; Business performance; Information technology; Organization capability
